Articles.Content:
This is our second attempt at Kreating Kookie parts.This is a pizzelle receipe that we formed around a dowel. Tried a fortune cookie recipe but forming them created too many cracks and too thick. Also trying to stay with the papercrafts scale since that project was pure inspiration (thanks arc5555). The third attempt will try to have moar parts that will be cut using templates, shaped, baked and hopefully decorated.

Pics of FL T400 next to papercraft part

http://imgur.com/0qOF04g

http://imgur.com/tAdoqvr

Edited July 16, 2014 by MoeslyArmlis
